attributes.additional_details: kids have enuff pressure from other kids like bullying and social pressure why put more pressure on kids just to get the teachers work done that didnt get done in class.if the teacher cant get the work done in class then its the teachers fault
attributes.background: goverment needs to stop all home work from schools and let kids have there down time and relax and be kids and not put pressure on kids..teachers get paid to teach in schools why should kids make teachers work more easy for them by putting pressure on kids so teachers work can get done ..
